mapper.select:
SELECT A.CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO , A.DEPT_CODE , B.INSPCT_INSTT_NM AS DEPT_NM , A.CHRG_TEAM_NM , A.ABRV , A.RCEPT_PC_IP , A.RM , A.USE_AT FROM SY_CHRG_TEAM A JOIN SY_INSPCT_INSTT B ON A.DEPT_CODE = B.INSPCT_INSTT_CODE AND B.USE_AT = 'Y' AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N'
AND A.DELETE_AT = 'N' AND A.DEPT_CODE = '3992'
AND A.CHRG_TEAM_NM LIKE '%' || #{chrgTeamNmSearch} || '%'
AND A.USE_AT = #{useAtSearch}
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'O' FROM SY_CHRG_TEAM_USER IA INNER JOIN SY_USER IB ON IA.TEAM_CHARGER_ID = IB.USER_ID WHERE IA.CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO = A.CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO AND IB.USER_NM LIKE '%' || #{userNmSearch} || '%' )
ORDER BY B.INSPCT_INSTT_NM, A.CHRG_TEAM_NM
SELECT CHRG_TEAM_IP_SEQNO ,CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO ,CHRG_TEAM_SE_NM ,RCEPT_PC_IP FROM SY_CHRG_TEAM_IP WHERE CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO = #{chrgTeamSeqno}
SELECT CHRG_TEAM_IP_SEQNO VALUE ,CHRG_TEAM_SE_NM KEY FROM SY_CHRG_TEAM_IP WHERE CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO = #{chrgTeamSeqno}

SELECT A.CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO , A.TEAM_CHARGER_ID USER_ID , B.USER_NM , A.TIMHDER_AT , C.INSPCT_INSTT_NM AS DEPT_NM FROM SY_CHRG_TEAM_USER A JOIN SY_USER B ON A.TEAM_CHARGER_ID = B.USER_ID INNER JOIN SY_INSPCT_INSTT C ON B.DEPT_CODE = C.INSPCT_INSTT_CODE WHERE A.CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO = #{chrgTeamSeqno} ORDER BY C.INSPCT_INSTT_NM, B.USER_NM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SY_CHRG_TEAM_USER ( CHRG_TEAM_SEQNO, TEAM_CHARGER_ID, LAST_CHANGER_ID, LAST_CHANGE_DT )VALUES( #{chrgTeamSeqno}, #{userId}, '${@lims.util.GetUserSession@getUserId()}', SYSDATE )
